New Records: USA won their first-ever international T20I match against Bangladesh
Key Match Events: Harmeet Singh hit the winning four to secure a five-wicket win for USA
Muztafizur Rahman took twin strikes to bring Bangladesh back into the game
Towhid Hridoy scored 58 off 47 balls for Bangladesh
Post-Match Reflections: USA captain Monank Patel praised his team's performance in their historic win
Player of the Match Harmeet Singh was thrilled with his match-winning cameo
Miscellaneous Highlights: This was the first-ever international fixture between USA and Bangladesh
The match was played at the Prairie View Cricket Complex in Houston, Texas
Others: Brief Scores: Bangladesh 153/6 of 20 overs, USA 156/5 of 19.3 overs
